org.multigraph.datatypes.number
Class NumberFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.multigraph.datatypes.Formatter
      org.multigraph.datatypes.number.NumberFormatter

public class NumberFormatter
extends Formatter

The NumberFormatter formats DataValues of DataType.NUMBER (i.e. type NumberValue).
